boardgame.name: DAK II: The Campaign In North Africa, 1940-1942
DAK2
boardgame.description: DAK II: The Campaign In North Africa, 1940-1942, is the 5th entry in The Gamer's/Multi-Man Publishing popular Operational Combat Series (OCS) and covers the entire campaign in the Western Desert theater in World War II at the regimental level, from Compass to El Alamein and beyond in 17 scenarios._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Scale:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Turn: Half Week_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hex: 5 miles / 8 Km_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Units: Company to Division_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Inventory:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Five 22 x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Six dual-side printed countersheets (1,540 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; counters)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 52-page OCS rules booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 64-page DAK II Vol. 1 game rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; scenario booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 40-page DAK II Vol. II game rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; scenario booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two 8-page DAK II Vol. III game rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; charts/tables booklets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One Map E Abstract player aid card (1-sided) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two 6-sided dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Complexity: High _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Solitaire Suitability: Medium_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing Time: 3 to Hundreds of hours_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Unpunched. Contents verified complete and in like new condition.A big ole sandbox full of Rommel here. Box is square and straight with only a couple of very minor corner creases on the back. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship on multiple purchases.

RESERVED FOR PADEFR2000 Punched not clipped. All contents verified complete and in like new condition however I HAVE NOT counted counters. Not a perfect box but will sit well on your shelf. Its big, its OCS and it is Rommel in the African sand box - how much more fun can you have then that. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.
